title: PHILOSOPHY   Ferrater 1964  pdf
description:
This is the spanish speaking world leading philosophy dictionary

the edition: 1964 (first one in the 40s ,last one was 1994)



Ferrater Mora was born in Barcelona

Forced to exile (civil war) he worked for decades in Pennsylvania , and this help him to combine with happy results the european (mostly german) and the analytical tradition of philosophy not to forget the mediterranean background of it all.


The current four-volume paper edition is indeed worth purchasing , but this may help students starting up.
